text: This is one heated competition! Kourtney Kardashian has been trying to one - up her ex Scott Disick in the love department! Details! Once Scott Disick, 34, and Kourtney Kardashian, 38, were a happy couple, now they ’ re rivals! Or at least that ’ s what we ’ re hearing! In recent days, Kourt has apparently been pretty nosy about Scott ’ s love life, according to our insiders! Moreover, we ’ ve learned that she ’ s even been bragging about her steamy relationship with BF Younes Bendjima, 24! “ Kourtney swears she doesn ’ t care that Scott ’ s in love with Sofia [ Richie, 19 ] but it ’ s hard to believe her, ” an insider tells
